exec go mod edit -replace github.com/Versent/go-vermock=$MUT
exec go mod tidy
exec vermockgen flags

cmp stdout stdout.golden
cmp stderr stderr.golden

-- stdout.golden --
-- stderr.golden --
-- go.mod --
module test

go 1.20

require github.com/Versent/go-vermock v0.0.0-00010101000000-000000000000
